productDetails.name: ACTIVATION_INSTRUCTIONS
productDetails.value:
- Make sure that your phone is connected to the internet with a stable WiFi connection.
 
 - iOS devices: Open your camera app and point it to the QR code above
 - Android and other OS: Go to the Cellular/Mobile network settings of your eSIM capable device and follow the instructions to Add Cellular Plan / Add Mobile Network. 
 
 - Once you download your eSIM profile, assign Cellular / Mobile Data access to your eSIM.
 
 - Enable Data Roaming 
 
  - You can track your data usage details at https://mobimatter.com/check-usage. 
 
 Note: While principles of eSIM activation remain the same, installation flows may vary slightly from one phone to another. Please refer to the online support of your device manufacturer for an exact step by step tutorial.
 
 Additional Information 
 - If you are connected to a network but data connectivity is not working as expected, please check if APN is mentioned in your eSIM profile information. If yes, please set the correct APN for your eSIM. Toggle Airplane mode ON and OFF and check the data speed again. 
 
 - If the operator is not not yet supporting balance check, you can see your usage directly directly from your phone settings. For iOS: Go to Settings->Cellular and scroll down. For Android and other OS: Go to Settings-> Network -> Internet and view your eSIM details. Please refer to your device manual for exact instructions. 
 
 - If you need more data, you can top-up this eSIM with various add-on packages or simply buy a new eSIM .

","Install your eSIM easily by following the instructions in the email we will send to you upon purchase.","Validity of the package will start only after the eSIM is installed on your device. ","Full data speeds - no daily limits, no throttling. Mobile hotspot is supported.","The eSIM will automatically connect to a major local mobile network in eligible destinations. Please contact us if you wish to inquire about the exact details.","Usable on all unlocked iOS and Android devices supporting eSIM technology. If in doubt, please check the FAQ section."]}

productDetails.name: ACTIVATION_INSTRUCTIONS
productDetails.value:
- Make sure that your phone is connected to the internet with a stable WiFi connection.
 
 - iOS devices: Open your camera app and point it to the QR code above
 - Android and other OS: Go to the Cellular/Mobile network settings of your eSIM capable device and follow the instructions to Add Cellular Plan / Add Mobile Network. 
 
 - Once you download your eSIM profile, assign Cellular / Mobile Data access to your eSIM.
 
 - Enable Data Roaming 
 
  - You can track your data usage details at https://mobimatter.com/check-usage. 
 
 Note: While principles of eSIM activation remain the same, installation flows may vary slightly from one phone to another. Please refer to the online support of your device manufacturer for an exact step by step tutorial.
 
 Additional Information 
 - If you are connected to a network but data connectivity is not working as expected, please check if APN is mentioned in your eSIM profile information. If yes, please set the correct APN for your eSIM. Toggle Airplane mode ON and OFF and check the data speed again. 
 
 - If the operator is not not yet supporting balance check, you can see your usage directly directly from your phone settings. For iOS: Go to Settings->Cellular and scroll down. For Android and other OS: Go to Settings-> Network -> Internet and view your eSIM details. Please refer to your device manual for exact instructions. 
 
 - If you need more data, simply buy any package of your choice and repeat the eSIM activation steps.
